tool_description: Get relevant and up to date crypto market information using GraphQL API. Checkout the About page to see available queries with fields that can be requested.
name: Cryptocurrency GraphQL
title: Cryptocurrency GraphQL

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
